lucy.dialogue: Hello Abner, welcome to The Guild.
Anyone is welcome. To become a member you will need to prove your worth by clearing out some trash mechs out back.

abner.dialogue: Hi there lucy, was wondering if me and my friends could come to work under this guild?
Alright, il see what i can do.

lucy.dialogue: Hello Abner, well done on your entrance exam.
We just got a message from some woodsmen outside the city that a giant mech is hindering their work.

abner.dialogue: Thanks. Me and my friends are looking for some work to do, got anything?
